title: The Sociological perspective: social class: work (TEFC)
creator_credit: BBC-TV, Open University and Ken Patton
brief_description: Compares social class positions and values of two contrasting occupations - engine drivers and architects. It shows several drivers and a London architect at work and talking about their work.
